parameters.description: A valid access token from the Spotify Accounts service: see the [Web API Authorization Guide](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/general/guides/authorization-guide/) for details.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: A comma-separated list of the [Spotify IDs](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api/#spotify-uris-and-ids) for the tracks. Maximum: 100 IDs.
parameters.name: ids
